displayProperties.description: An emblem designed as tribute to a community member past, Seraphim Crypto. You can read more about their legend in [the TWAB of September 15, 2022](https://www.bungie.net/en/Explore/Detail/News/51779).

1171206947.sourceString: Source: Complete the "Last Wish" raid within the first 24 hours of release.

displayProperties.supplement: Rare reward from defeating "Morgeth, the Spirekeeper."
Earned by opening the "Glittering Key" chest.
Earned by completing all "Last Wish" raid challenges.
Earned by entering the "3rd Wish" at the "Wall of Wishes."
Earned by completing all "Garden of Salvation" raid challenges.

3938759711.sourceString: Complete the "Garden of Salvation" raid within the first 24 hours of release.

2172413746.sourceString: Complete the "Vault of Glass" raid and all encounter challenges within the first 24 hours of release.

displayProperties.supplement: Collect both "Crimson Days" sparrows.

Complete the quest for Festival of the Lost 2020.

In recognition of completing all Season 17 Week 1 Seasonal Challenges.
Obtain the exotic auto rifle "Quicksilver Storm" by preordering the Lightfall + Annual Pass bundle.
During Season of Plunder, earn 7,777 Arc final blows.
Gift 2 subscriptions to a Destiny 2 Twitch streamer.

Gift 2 subscriptions to a Destiny 2 Twitch streamer.

For linking an Epic Games Store account in celebration Destiny 2's release on the Epic Games Store.
For linking an Epic Games Store account in celebration Destiny 2's release on the Epic Games Store.

For progressing Festival of the Lost 2021.

4224291482.sourceString: Source: During Guardian Games 2024, have a top 10% standing in either "Vying for Supremacy" or "Shoot to Score" at the time of weekly reset, and then speak to Eva Levante in the Tower to claim.
